sites.name: Ecommerce Headphones Website

sites.name: Weather App

sites.name: Admin Dashboard
sites.description: Made this Admin Dashboard with the help of syncfusion components and Reactjs. It includes 4 simple Apps (Calendar, Kanban, Editor, and Color Picker), and some table to show records which can be added, update and deleted.
